tool_description: Analyzes scheduling conflicts by comparing new appointment requests against existing schedules and identifying overlaps or constraint violations.

provider_id.description: Provider ID to check conflicts for

duration_minutes.description: Duration of requested appointment in minutes

check_buffer.description: Whether to check for buffer time between appointments

error_messages: Provider not found: No provider exists with the specified provider_id
Invalid duration: Duration must be a positive integer between 1 and 480 minutes
Invalid buffer time: Buffer minutes must be between 0 and 60
Invalid datetime format: requested_datetime must be in ISO 8601 format
usage: Specify provider_id, requested appointment time and duration. Optionally enable buffer time checking. The tool returns detailed conflict analysis.

conflict_type.description: Type of conflict found: overlap, buffer_violation, outside_hours, or none

suggested_alternatives.description: Alternative time slots that avoid conflicts
